name: Happy Cog
description:
We design and build websites and digital products your users will love—and make you part of the process at every step. 
At the intersection of your business goals and your users’ needs, Happy Cog builds websites and applications that yield measurable results. 

Dedicated to maintaining our reputation as a team that plays nicely with others we focus on both the quality of our collaboration with our partners, along with outcomes that meet the industry’s highest standards. 
We work across industries and verticals with global leaders including Zappos.com, Nintendo Americas, MTV/Viacom, Harvard Business School, The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, Groupon, The United States Holocaust Memorial and Museum, Black Hills Energy, BBVA Compass, AMC Theatres, McGraw-Hill, and countless others.
